Description__c: Use this to create any rebalances. You'll also be prompted to create any portfolio switches if these are relevant after the rebalances. You'll do this in bulk.
Name: Rebalance

Description__c: Use this to recommend a portfolio switch for an existing product. You'll also e prompte dto rebalance any that are needed. You'll do this in bulk.
Name: Portfolio switch

Description__c: Use this to recommend making a lump sum to either an existing or recommended product.
Name: Lump sum

Description__c: Use this to recommend any Bed&ISAs, Bed&JISAs, Bed&SIPPs, Bed&JSIPPs and internal GIA-GIA transfers. You'll do this in bulk.
Name: Internal transfer

Description__c: Use this to recommend opening a new product (including protection products). You'll do this one at a time.
Name: Open product

Description__c: Use this to recommend changing the amount of an existing regular. You'll do this one at a time.
Name: Cancel existing regular

Description__c: Use this to recommend changing the amount of an existing regular. You'll do this one at a time.
Name: Change existing regular

Description__c: Use this to recommend a transfer from an external product into an Octopus Wealth one. You'll do this one at a time.
Name: External transfer in

Description__c: Use this to set up regulars to any Octopus ISA, JISA or GIA (including ones which are pending). You'll also be prompted to create recommendations to cancel regulars if required. You'll do this one at a time.
Name: Regular

Description__c: Use this to recommend that an external product is retained, and provide a reason for this. You'll do this one at a time.
Name: Retain

Description__c: Use this to recommend the clients have a protection review in the future. You'll be asked no details about this, but when it is accepted, a piece of protection advice will be created automatically.
Name: Protection review

Description__c: Use this to recommend a single withdrawal from a GIA, ISA or SIPP. You'll do this one at a time.
Name: Withdrawal - lump sum

Description__c: Use this to recommend regular withdrawals from a GIA, ISA or SIPP. You'll do this one at a time.
Name: Withdrawal - regular

Description__c: Use this to recommend an off process action which the client will fulfil
Name: Non-standard action - client fulfilled

Description__c: Use this to recommend an off process action which we will fulfil
Name: Non-standard action - NOVA fulfilled

Description__c: Use this to recommend that a SIPPs expression of wishes are updated. You'll choose the SIPP an provide beneficiary details on the next screen.
Name: Update expression of wishes

Description__c: Use this to recommend that an existing protection policy is cancelled.
Name: Cancel existing protection policy

Description__c: Use this to recommend that an existing protection policy is placed into a provider trust.
Name: Set up provider trust
